question: 2 (d)
statement_html: A bag contains 5 red balls, 3 green balls, and 2 yellow balls. If balls are always replaced into the bag after being drawn, what is the probability of drawing the same colour out of the bag on two successive attempts?
statement_latex:
A bag contains 5 red balls, 3 green balls, and 2 yellow balls. If balls
are always replaced into the bag after being drawn, what is the
probability of drawing the same colour out of the bag on two successive
attempts?
statement_raw: A bag contains 5 red balls, 3 green balls, and 2 yellow balls. If balls are always replaced into the bag after being drawn, what is the probability of drawing the same colour out of the bag on two successive attempts?
